005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.util.List;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023/**
024 * Implements the XPath 3.1
025 * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-data">fn:data</a>
026 * functions.
027 */
028public final class FnData {
029  private static final String NAME = "data";
030  @NonNull
031  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_NO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
032      .name(NAME)
033      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
034      .deterministic()
035      .contextDependent()
036      .focusDependent()
037      .returnType(IAnyAtomicItem.type())
038      .returnOne()
039      .functionHandler(FnData::executeNoArg)
040      .build();
041
042  @NonNull
043  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
044      .name(NAME)
045      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
046      .deterministic()
047      .contextIndependent()
048      .focusIndependent()
049      .argument(IArgument.builder()
050          .name("arg1")
051          .type(IItem.type())
052          .zeroOrMore()
053          .build())
054      .returnType(IAnyAtomicItem.type())
055      .returnOne()
056      .functionHandler(FnData::executeOneArg)
057      .build();
058
059  private FnData() {
060    // disable construction
061  }
062
063  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
064  @NonNull
065  private static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> executeNoArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
066      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
067      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
068      IItem focus) {
069
070    INodeItem item = FunctionUtils.requireTypeOrNull(INodeItem.class, focus);
071
072    ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> retval;
073    if (item == null) {
074      retval = ISequence.empty();
075    } else {
076      IAnyAtomicItem data = item.toAtomicItem();
077      retval = ISequence.of(data);
078    }
079    return retval;
080  }
081
082  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
083  @NonNull
084  private static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> executeOneArg(
085      @NonNull IFunction function,
086      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
087      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
088      IItem focus) {
089
090    return ISequence.of(FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0))).atomize());
091  }
092}
